title: Formula for Sum of the first $$5$$ terms of Arithmetic Sequence
text: The formula for the sum of the first $$5$$ terms of the arithmetic sequence is $$S_5=\frac{5\left(\frac{3}{2}+\frac{7}{2}\right)}{2}$$.
